Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Isabella Costa's reputation has taken a significant hit due to the rejection of her allocation plan by investor Hannah Muller. The absence of a proposed allocation plan, combined with the context of being on each other's blacklist, raises serious doubts about her trustworthiness and competence. The failure of this investment highlights her difficulties in fostering positive investment relationships and effectively communicating strategies. As a result, her reputation within the investment community suffers, necessitating a dedicated effort to rebuild her credibility going forward.
